Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert instructional designer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to suggest a title for the course.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a title for the course using the questions and answers above. The title cannot be longer than 5 words.

QApair.Question: What is the focus of the course?
QApair.Answer: Provide students the skill of web designing.

QApair.Question: What is the level of the course?
QApair.Answer: Preliminary

QApair.Question: What are the goals of the course?
QApair.Answer: To equip students with web development skills and make them capable of taking up web development tasks.

QApair.Question: What is the format of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course will be conducted in-person.

QApair.Question: What is the duration of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is 8 weeks long.

QApair.Question: What is the schedule of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is provided as a 2 hour class on every Tuesday.

QApair.Question: What is the size of the class?
QApair.Answer: Size of the class is 50 students.

QApair.Question: What is the age group of the students?
QApair.Answer: Students are between 18 to 45 years old.

QApair.Question: What is the gender mix of the students?
QApair.Answer: Both male & female students can take this class.

QApair.Question: What are the qualifications of the students?
QApair.Answer: Students should have a basic understanding of how the web works.

QApair.Question: What is the focus of the course?
QApair.Answer: Help students improve communication skills.

QApair.Question: What is the level of the course?
QApair.Answer: Elementary

QApair.Question: What are the goals of the course?
QApair.Answer: To find areas where students are struggling to communicate properly and help them improve in those areas.

QApair.Question: What is the format of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course will be conducted in-person.

QApair.Question: What is the duration of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is 12 weeks long.

QApair.Question: What is the schedule of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is provided as a 1 hour class on every Monday & Tuesday.

QApair.Question: What is the size of the class?
QApair.Answer: Size of the class is 20 students.

QApair.Question: What is the age group of the students?
QApair.Answer: Students are between 12 to 40 years old.

QApair.Question: What is the gender mix of the students?
QApair.Answer: Both male & female students can take this class.

QApair.Question: What are the qualifications of the students?
QApair.Answer: No prior knowledge required for this course.

QApair.Question: What is the focus of the course?
QApair.Answer: Teach advanced accounting methods

QApair.Question: What is the level of the course?
QApair.Answer: Expert

QApair.Question: What are the goals of the course?
QApair.Answer: To help students understand mechanisms which help create a smooth accounting system in large corporations.

QApair.Question: What is the format of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course will be conducted online over zoom.

QApair.Question: What is the duration of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is 6 weeks long.

QApair.Question: What is the schedule of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course is provided as a 4 hour class on every Friday with a 15 min break after 2 hours.

QApair.Question: What is the size of the class?
QApair.Answer: Size of the class is 25 students.

QApair.Question: What is the age group of the students?
QApair.Answer: Students are between 25 to 50 years old.

QApair.Question: What is the gender mix of the students?
QApair.Answer: Both male & female students can take this class.

QApair.Question: What are the qualifications of the students?
QApair.Answer: Students should have a solid foundation in accounting and finance management concepts.
